00029 #define CLAMP(xx,ll,rr)         ((xx) = (xx)<(ll)? (ll): (xx)>(rr)? (rr): (xx))

00087         
00088 #ifndef PROCLOGNAME
00089 #define PROCLOGNAME "acq200control"
00090 #endif
00091         
00092 #define ACQ200_SYSLOG_SCREEN 1
00093 #define ACQ200_SYSLOG_SYSLOG 2
00094 
00095 #ifndef ACQ200_SYSLOG_MODE
00096 #define ACQ200_SYSLOG_MODE (ACQ200_SYSLOG_SCREEN|ACQ200_SYSLOG_SYSLOG)
00097 #endif
00098 
00099 #if ((ACQ200_SYSLOG_MODE & ACQ200_SYSLOG_SCREEN) != 0)
00100 #define _ACQ200_SYSLOG_SCREEN(pri, fmt, args...) fprintf(stderr, fmt, ##args)
00101 #else
00102 #define _ACQ200_SYSLOG_SCREEN(pri, fmt, args...)
00103 #endif
00104 
00105 #if ((ACQ200_SYSLOG_MODE & ACQ200_SYSLOG_SYSLOG) != 0)
00106 #define _ACQ200_SYSLOG_SYSLOG(pri, fmt, args...)\
00107 do {                                            \
00108         openlog(PROCLOGNAME, 0, LOG_USER);      \
00109         syslog(pri, fmt, ## args);              \
00110         closelog();                             \
00111 } while (0)                                     
00112 #else
00113 #define _ACQ200_SYSLOG_SYSLOG(pri, fmt, args...)
00114 #endif
00115 
00116 
00117 #define ACQ200_SYSLOG(pri, fmt, args...)                        \
00118         do {                                                    \
00119                 _ACQ200_SYSLOG_SCREEN(pri, fmt, ## args);       \
00120                 _ACQ200_SYSLOG_SYSLOG(pri, fmt, ## args);       \
00121         }while(0)

00130 #define dbg(lvl, format, arg...)                                        \
00131         do {                                                            \
00132                 if(acq200_debug>=lvl ){                                 \
00133                         if (lvl <= 1){                                  \
00134                                 ACQ200_SYSLOG( LOG_DEBUG,               \
00135                                                "%s " format "\n",       \
00136                                                FN, ## arg );            \
00137                         }else{                                          \
00138                                 fprintf(stderr,                         \
00139                                         "deb(%d) %s " format "\n",      \
00140                                         lvl, FN, ## arg );              \
00141                         }                                               \
00142                 }                                                       \
00143         } while(0)

00145 static inline char* chomp(char *src) {
00146         char *plast = src + strlen(src) - 1;
00147         while(*plast == '\n' || *plast == '\r'){
00148                 *plast-- = '\0';
00149                 if (plast == src){
00150                         break;
00151                 }
00152         }
00153         return src;
00154 }
00155 
00156 static inline char* tr(char *src, char c1, char c2){
00157         int ii = 0;
00158         int i2 = strlen(src);
00159         for (ii = 0; ii < i2; ii++){
00160                 if (src[ii] == c1){
00161                         src[ii] = c2;
00162                 }
00163         }
00164         return src;
00165 }
